nodes.text: A male individual was the husband of Darita, a TIE pilot and captain in the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing. Darita was killed during a battle, around 5 ABY. That year, Darita's husband was stationed with Imperial loyalist forces on the planet Jakku. After the 204th also traveled to the world, the dead captain's sister, Lieutenant Darita, took a shuttle to Jakku's surface to inform her brother-in-law about the death of his wife.
Darita's husband was mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
